==Lore==
The [[Fontaine Research Institute]] had brought in huge engineering devices and developed new machines including the legendary "Golden Vessel" to bore the tunnel. The success of the project spurred the development of a whole new generation of clockwork technology, including the [[Construction Specialist Mek]] which was based on the Golden Vessel.
